thread.title: BRIEF-CIT Announces Public Offerings Of Senior Unsecured Notes And Subordinated Notes

title: BRIEF-CIT Announces Public Offerings Of Senior Unsecured Notes And Subordinated Notes
text: March 6, 2018 / 2:23 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-CIT Announces Public Offerings Of Senior Unsecured Notes And Subordinated Notes Reuters Staff March 6 (Reuters) - Cit Group Inc: * CIT ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERINGS OF SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES AND SUBORDINATED NOTES * CIT GROUP INC - COMMENCED A PUBLIC OFFERING OF TWO SERIES OF SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION REGISTERED SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES DUE 2021 AND 2025 * CIT GROUP INC - ALSO COMMENCED A PUBLIC OFFERING OF SUBORDINATED NOTES DUE 2028 Source text for Eikon:
